message:
Hello! Welcome to the Oxy Gaming Discord server!

We use this server primarily to talk with each other, hang out, and find people to play games with. We also post all of our upcoming events here (if you would like to be pinged for new events, head over to <#1016466408743370752> and let us know!)
Please feel free to send any feedback our way in <#1016458040364499104>, or by messaging any eboard member.

Also, check out these other cool servers:

Oxy Pokemon GO: https://discord.gg/SkQRttZPmr
Oxy Hellfire Club: https://discord.gg/pycvhg6Rr7
